name: NanaWall Systems
overview:
NanaWall Systems’ founders created their first opening glass wall, framed by wood, in 1986; in 1989, the company was incorporated. NanaWall’s products perform the dual role of wall and sliding glass door, adding a beautiful aesthetic to homes while letting in lots of sunlight. Since forming a partnership with the Germany-based Solarlux, NanaWall Systems has gained a reputation as the leading provider of opening glass walls across North America.

NanaWall Systems’ namesake product enables customers to redefine the boundary between interior and exterior space through its vanishing glass-wall composition. The glass wall stretches from floor to ceiling. The wall slides smoothly on an overhead track hidden from view, preventing the product’s mechanics from interfering with pleasing aesthetics.

NanaWalls come in a variety of shapes and sizes to fit any space. Customers can order curved and straight designs, and in a variety of colors, configurations, finishes, and even folding systems. All glass walls meet industry standards for structural performance, water penetration, air filtration, and more.
